definition: aromatic bulb used as seasoning, to cause bodily suffering to and make sick or indisposed
details:
noun
- aromatic bulb used as seasoning
= synonyms: garlic
verb
- to cause bodily suffering to and make sick or indisposed
= example: to cause bodily suffering to and make sick or indisposed
= synonyms: trouble
- to be ill or unwell
= example: to be ill or unwell
